intro: Euryops calvescens, commonly known as the yellow starbursh, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a member of the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features dense, bushy growth with bright yellow flowers that bloom in clusters, resembling a starburst. Its leaves are typically narrow and gray-green, with a hairy texture. Euryops calvescens thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it a hardy ornamental plant in gardens.
